function lsm_select_row( i_lsm_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_status_dom.id%type
                       , o_rt_lsm   out lm_ebs_lane_status_dom%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lsm_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lsm ( i_lsm_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_status_dom.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_ebs_lane_status_dom lsm
            where lsm.id = i_lsm_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_lsm( i_lsm_id => i_lsm_id );
         fetch c_lsm into o_rt_lsm;
         l_found := c_lsm%found;
         close c_lsm;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lsm%isopen
         then
            close c_lsm;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lsm_select_row;

return boolean
is

   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_lsm ( i_lsm_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_status_dom.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_ebs_lane_status_dom lsm
            where lsm.id = i_lsm_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_lsm( i_lsm_id => i_lsm_id );
   fetch c_lsm into o_rt_lsm;
   l_found := c_lsm%found;
   close c_lsm;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_lsm%isopen
      then
         close c_lsm;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end lsm_select_row_upd;

                                      , o_rt_lsm => o_rt_lsm );
      end if;

      when others

   end;
end lsm_select_row_upd_uk1;

                                      , o_rt_lsm => o_rt_lsm );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);

end lsm_select_row_upd_uk2;

procedure lsm_lock_row( i_lsm_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_status_dom.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lsm_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_lsm ( i_lsm_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_status_dom.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_ebs_lane_status_dom lsm
              where lsm.id = i_lsm_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_lsm_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                lsm_lock_row_nowait( i_lsm_id => i_lsm_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_lsm( i_lsm_id => i_lsm_id );
                  close c_lsm;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lsm%isopen
         then
            close c_lsm;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lsm_lock_row;

procedure lsm_lock_row_nowait( i_lsm_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_status_dom.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lsm_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lsm ( i_lsm_id   in  lm_ebs_lane_status_dom.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_ebs_lane_status_dom lsm
               where lsm.id = i_lsm_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_lsm_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_lsm( i_lsm_id => i_lsm_id );

            close c_lsm;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_lsm%isopen
        then
           close c_lsm;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lsm_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lsm_lock_row_nowait;


end lm_lsm_tapi_pck;
